ygData.subject: Re: mutitaskin madness
ygData.msgSnippet: i manage to continue DL stuff but the game ran really slow .it  took me 2sec to make a purchase!also it took me reaally long to enter into eq thus makin me
ygData.messageBody:
i manage to continue DL stuff but the game ran really slow .it took me
2sec to make a purchase!also it took me reaally long to enter into eq
thus makin me initially think tat it cant work

LKW wrote:
>
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Basically you cant run EQ with other software. H/w, EQ does understand the
> popularity of anti-virus s/w and other commonly used utilities s/w like
> Norton safe guard - so these kinda s/w will not affect the loading of ya
> EQ.
>
> As for other s/w like MIE, ICQ etc, you can't run them together with EQ.
> Even if you can, you can't switch between them and EQ since EQ will crash
> when u do so. This is also a measure to prevent 3rd party EQ s/w to macro
> training or cheating I guess.
>
> Ziltus
>
> On Saturday, June 26, 1999 10:39 PM, hans ng [SMTP:nahemah@...]
> wrote:
> > From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> >
> > i cant seem to work eq while downloadin stuff newsgroups....have any of
> > u tried havin someother program run in the background b4? i know my
> > norton anti virus has started up by itself b4 while i m in eq with out
> > interuptin my game so while cant i DL stuff andplay?????
